name: SCM Database Privileged Operation
description: Detects non-system users performing privileged operation os the SCM database
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:4674 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:/[Ss][Cc]_[Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]\ [Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt]/ AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.PrivilegeList:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Aa][Kk][Ee][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ii][Pp][Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ii][Ll][Ee][Gg][Ee]/) AND (NOT (winlog.logon.id:/0[Xx]3[Ee]4/ AND process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:4674 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:SC_MANAGER\ OBJECT AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:servicesactive AND winlog.event_data.PrivilegeList:SeTakeOwnershipPrivilege) AND (NOT (winlog.logon.id:0x3e4 AND process.executable:*\:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe)))`
